name: ExerTrain
description:
Welcoming Junior Conductors of all shapes and sizes! Conduct your very own train as you travel to your final destination. 

ExerTrain is VR Exercise Game where you play as a Junior Conductor on their first day operating the Exertrain. With your Personal Train Assistant or PAT giving you instructions, you get to do the many odd tasks to keep the train going. As you do different maintenance tasks around the Train, you see your train enter into the snowy mountains to the vastness of space. Blow that whistle as you enter landscapes beyond your imagination.

Recommended Device: Meta Quest headset
